title: Horner: Verstappen the greatest F1 driver Red Bull has had
summary: Horner believes Verstappen is on a different level to Red Bull's other four-time world champion Vettel

qa_pairs.question: Who is the team principal of Red Bull Racing?
How many world championships has Sebastian Vettel won with Red Bull Racing?
As of 2023, which driver is considered by Christian Horner to be the greatest driver Red Bull has had?
